alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Owsley; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 6:55PM EDT until May 19 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Owsley County in southeastern Kentucky... West central Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Central Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 655 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lower Buffalo, or near Booneville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grass around 700 PM EDT. St. Helens around 705 PM EDT. Tallega around 710 PM EDT. Athol around 715 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Fillmore and Oakdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
